solar_summary.subtitle: Here's what your solar panel system could deliver — in simple terms:
solar_summary.tagline: Use your own power. Save on your bills. Earn from what's left.

summary_block.heading: ✅ Summary
summary_block.text:
Your {{panel_count}}-panel system ({{system_size}} kWp) will generate about {{annual_generation}} kWh per year — roughly {{usage_percent}}% of your current electricity use.

🔹 **Use:** {{self_use_percent}}% of that power (≈ {{self_use_kwh}} kWh) goes straight into your home, saving you around **£{{self_use_savings}}** each year.
🔹 **Sell:** The rest ({{sold_back_percent}}%) is sold back to your supplier, earning about **£{{export_earnings}}**.

💰 **Total annual benefit:** **£{{annual_benefit}}**
💡 **Estimated installation cost:** **£{{install_cost}}**
🌤️ **Simple payback:** Around **{{payback_years}} years** before your system starts earning pure profit.

usage_vs_generation.title: Your Energy Use vs Solar Generation

tooltips.annual_generation: The total electricity your solar panels produce each year.
tooltips.use: The share of your solar power you use directly — for lights, washing, cooking and other daytime use.
tooltips.save: The money you save each year by using your own electricity instead of buying from the grid.
tooltips.earn: The money you earn for extra power your panels generate and sell automatically to your energy supplier.
tooltips.sold_back_percent: When your panels produce more electricity than you use, the surplus is sold back to your supplier via the Smart Export Guarantee.
